name: Evil Wizard II
overview: Evil Wizard II is the sequel to Jesper Lindström's text-based RPG, The Evil Wizard, but re-imagined as a horizontal shoot 'em up. It was developed using Richard Bayliss' and Jonathan Wells' Sideways Shoot 'Em Up Construction Kit mod. The music for the game was made by Anders Carlsson, and the game itself was published by TND in 2012.
